comment:
* Callback object to be called when the toast is shown or hidden.
     *
     * @see #makeText(Context, CharSequence, int)
     * @see #addCallback(Callback)

methods.name: public void onToastShown()
methods.comment: * Called when the toast is displayed on the screen.

methods.name: public void onToastHidden()
methods.comment: * Called when the toast is hidden.
